title: Paladins Deluxe Edition 2023
description:
Experience the best way to play Paladins!

The Paladins Deluxe Edition 2023 includes the latest Season Pass as well as instant access to over 30 Champions!
longDescription:
The Paladins Deluxe Edition 2023 includes the latest Season Pass, all content from the Starter and Gold Editions, and 10 extra Champions!

You’ll have instant access to a roster of 38 characters and instantly unlock the newest 2023 Champions upon their release!

Plus: You’ll get Exclusive content for new Champions, all year long! Get every new Season Pass Limited Skin, Unlocked Talents, Emotes, MVP Poses, and more for every new Champion released!

Best of all, you’ll instantly unlock cosmetics you can only get in the Season Pass: The Limited Grave Danger Androxus and Deathwing Mount.

As a special bonus, you’ll also receive 2,100 Crystals -- a $22 value! Unlock the newest Event Pass, a favorite Skin, or a new Chest -- the choice is yours!

You'll also receive a 10% bonus on any Crystal purchases you make all year long!

12 Damage Champions: Bomb King, Dredge, Drogoz, Imani, Kinessa, Lian, Sha Lin, Strix, Cassie, Tyra, Vivian, and Willo

8 Support Champions: Corvus, Jenos, Grohk, Grover, Io, Mal'Damba, Pip, and Ying

9 Flank Champions: Androxus, Buck, Evie, Koga, Moji, Skye, Talus, Vora, and Zhin

9 Frontline Champions: Atlas, Barik, Fernando, Inara, Ruckus, Makoa, Raum, Terminus, and Torvald

And an additional 30,000 Gold players can use to purchase another Champion of their choosing!

This Edition offers you the best value!

Please note that this Edition contains all content included in the Starter and Gold Editions as well as the latest Season Pass DLC.
